DEMO_020_MSG_010:
́How in the... I got whooped... Damn you an' yer 
pesky little Resistance... !
DEMO_020_MSG_020:
̅Oh... Human... you've done well to rescue us, young one. Allow me to introduce myself... I am the Nochoro King.
ā
DEMO_020_MSG_030:
̅Oh, look at that... a human who fights alongside monsters...
You are indeed the Monster Master, spoken of in our legends.
DEMO_020_MSG_040:
̅That appearance, as well... It is as Boshock noticed... 
You are undoubtedly a member of the Resistance.
DEMO_020_MSG_050:
̅I see... and yet, you claim to know nothing of the Resistance? That's quite odd that your Reactor would merely be a decoration.
ā
DEMO_020_MSG_060: ̅Hmm... So, while searching for your lost memories, you say you ran into one of our Nochora members...
DEMO_020_MSG_070:
̅We owe you our lives, little one... But I'd be more than happy to part with my wisdom than my life, oh hoh hoh hoh...
ā
DEMO_020_MSG_080:
̅Alrighty men, give me a lift back to Wood Park. We shall meet there, and discuss further details of your situation.
ā
DEMO_020_MSG_090:
̅I have something of my own that I wish to discuss
with you in detail, young Monster Master.
